name: Buckethead 4: Magnets of Madness
description:
Play the sequel to the critically acclaimed Buckethead 2, where Buckethead now has to face off against magnetic challenges in this atmospheric puzzle platformer.

Use the power of magnetic attraction and repulsion to make your way through various levels and puzzles, and help Buckethead defeat Trius, the evil magnetic overlord!

Controls:

A/Left Arrow Key and D/Right Arrow Key - Move left/right
Space/W/Up Arrow Key - Jump
Shift - Dash
Q - Power on magnet
E - Interact
R - Reverse magnet charge
